item.title: I invested $200K in my daughter’s 529 plan. She doesn’t want to go to college. What should I do with this money?
item.description: “Are there any other ways I can consider transferring the wealth to her?”

item.title: Ray Dalio is back with a fresh warning, and it’s about the Fed’s new policy
item.description: The legendary investor is warning about the impact of a move at the Fed others might call technical.

item.title: Here’s how many flights at major U.S. airports are on the chopping block with looming FAA cuts due to shutdown
item.description: About 1,800 flights could be scrapped on Friday if the U.S. goes ahead with shutdown-related airport cuts.

item.title: More bad news for home buyers: Real-estate investors are seizing an opening and ramping up purchases
item.description: As home buyers shy away from the housing market, real-estate investors are seizing the opening and ramping up their purchases.

item.title: I’m selling my condo and have $130K to invest. Is this a bad time to invest in the S&P 500?
item.description: ‘What is the smartest way to create income with this money?’
